Plot: At the height of his career, Charles Dickens meets a younger woman who becomes his secret lover until his death.
Title: The Invisible Woman
Actors: Felicity Jones, John Kavanagh, Tom Attwood, Susanna Hislop
tomatoConsensus: Its deliberate pace will frustrate some viewers, but for fans of handsomely mounted period drama, The Invisible Woman offers visual as well as emotional cinematic nourishment.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 7 nominations.
